short_description: HIGH STATIC PRESSURE: Efficient even with resistance – the generated airflow easily penetrates dense radiators, narrow perforated panels and mesh structures and ensures reliable cooling

name: CORSAIR RS120 ARGB 120mm PWM Fan – Daisy-Chain Connection – Low-Noise – Magnetic Dome Bearing – Single Pack – Black
short_description: Streamlined Fan Connections: Daisy-chain multiple fans together and control them all through just one 4-pin PWM connector and one +5V ARGB connector.
Lighting Made Easy: Eight LEDs per fan shine bright with customisable lighting through your motherboard’s built-in ARGB control (requires compatible motherboard).
Precise PWM Speeds: Set your fan speeds up to 2,100 RPM while providing up to 72.8 CFM airflow to your system.
CORSAIR AirGuide Technology: Anti-vortex vanes direct airflow at your hottest components for concentrated cooling, pushing air in the direction you need when mounted to a radiator or heatsink.
High Static Pressure: RS fans work well as radiator fans with a static pressure of 2.8mm-H2O to push through obstructions.
product_description: Add a CORSAIR RS120 ARGB 120mm PWM Fan to your PC cooling setup. Daisy-chained connectors let you link multiple fans together and control them all through just one 4-pin PWM and one +5V ARGB header on your motherboard. Enjoy fan speeds up to 2,100 RPM, with the static pressure to also serve as radiator fans. CORSAIR AirGuide technology with anti-vortex vanes directs airflow for concentrated, powerful cooling. Eight LEDs light up your build with simple +5V ARGB motherboard control. Magnetic Dome bearings ensure quieter operation and increased longevity, while Zero RPM mode offers silent operation at low loads.
